name: LFG DRAGONZ EDGE HC
description:
Another group dared to enter your lair. After clearing the dungeon, they are heading towards you. Wipe the group and show them who is the boss of the Dragon's Edge dungeon!

Play the role of the final boss in an MMORPG dungeon and defeat the group which dares to challenge you.

The battle takes place on the edge of the platform from which the dragon (boss) rises.

A game created  for VimJam 2: Boss [8 Bits to Infinity] with the theme "On The Edge".

All assets, code and music created by Opossum in a Jar (Spyridon Glarakis).
